name: Brothers on the slide
lyrics: You can't win so you know you must lose

We know which way you goin'
We know which way you goin'

Make you pay up all you due
We know which way you goin'
We know which way you goin'
We know which way you goin'
We know which way you goin'
We know which way you goin'
We know which way you goin'
We know which way you goin'
